title: When the enemy team thinks you're helpless without your adc

replies.body:
{{champion:67}} : WTF Bard just 1 shot me!

{{champion:432}} : {{item:3285}}  {{item:3087}}  Oops.

Based on a true story.
A friend of mine specifically picks up {{item:3094}} on bard for this reason. The harass is absolutely stupid.
I'm going to try that later
Which ADC? Your toplane ADC? Your jungle ADC? Your mid ADC? Your support ADC? Or your ADC ADC?
The River ADC.
Full AD/On-Hit {{champion:98}} OP.

You mean bot ADC :<

This is why the bot lane meta is so stale... :<

And they haven't yet realized that you built full dmg until its too late

{{champion:117}}  *Enemy double kill!*
{{champion:22}} /all WHO GAVE HER A SOCK?

Major misconception that will get you killed #427:

Taric does no damage

{{champion:44}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3075}} 

Bring it on, bitch
report taric no sightstone
tarric's a top, who sometimes is a bottom
Yes, i play taric top way more then support, but this thread is implying that this was meant to be a support build
You're wasting 10% CDR there, but I'm not sure what to replace the {{item:3110}} with.

Replace {{item:3065}}{{item:3075}} with {{item:3512}}{{item:3143}} or {{item:3512}}{{item:3068}}.  Your W + passive is going to kill them, not Thornmail.  Chances are, the ADC won't want to target you anyhow.
That build is normally what I end up with against more AP heavy teams, which is what normally happens because Murphy's law
ZZ'rot and Visage have only 10 magic resistance difference though.
20% increased healing is a HUGE benefit to you, though
Also, I go 45% CDR on my Taric. <_<

> [{quoted}](name=BodkinsOdds,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=5QE4P9XQ,comment-id=00070001,timestamp=2016-03-17T15:03:00.791+0000)
>
> You're wasting 10% CDR there, but I'm not sure what to replace the {{item:3110}} with.

Getting {{item:3025}} and {{item:3110}} is the problem.  Because of the redundancy of CDR and mana it is usually better to get one or the other but not both.  If you want the attack speed reduction aura get {{item:3143}}.  Otherwise a simple {{item:3068}} would do the trick.  Presumably, he's just trying to get as much armor as possible, in which case a second {{item:3075}} is also redundant but cheaper and gives more armor.
but, mana.
They shall be crushed.

His passive is one of the my favorite things about his kit. As long as he keeps hitting someone, he can practically spam his abilities. Sadly I don't think they are going to keep it on him after his rework :(

Well, they did say they wanted his passive to be "very similar" to live, but I'm not sure if that means it's gonna keep the cooldown reduction.

45% CDR = endless CC lock.

*picks {{champion:143}}* 
*Accidentally gets highest damage dealt to champions as support again*
I mean Zyra's sustained damage is really pretty great, so there's nothing unusual about that.
Yeah... And yet, everyone's always surprised when I'm the only one who can kill that poor squishy {{champion:85}}  who keeps running around.

{{champion:412}} walks in, and sees Dobby. He then hits Dobby in the face with his lantern repeatedly until Dobby is trapped inside it.

{{champion:412}} "Be a free elf now noob!"
because we all know Dobby would never click the lantern
LOLOLOL!!!
What is this movie?
harry potter
hp
Hewlett-Packard
{{champion:37}} Full AP (But with a Sightstone) *Plays a little tune while a float away*
